name: The Devil Wears Trident
description:
The Devil Wears Trident

Hell is freezing!

Pick up the devil's trident and try to unfreeze hell again in this puzzle platformer with a strong focus on punishing humans by poking them in the butt with your trident and throwing them into fire pits.

This game was made for the VimJam 3

game jam with the jam focus "Multi-use" and the theme "Turn up the heat". Thanks for playing the game, have fun, and feel free to comment.

Supported platforms: HTML5

Controls:

Move: Left/right arrow

Jump: Up arrow

Poke: X, Space

Throw: C, Ctrl (if unlocked)

Block: Down arrow (if unlocked)

Recall Tridents: Z(Y), R (if unlocked)

(Cheat, use only in case of emergency) Skip Level: O (the letter)

Team:

Idea, Design, Programming, mashing assets together: Myself

Sound, Music: Sheyvan https://soundcloud.com/sheyvan 

Additional Art: The Beautiful Ugly https://twitter.com/bootyfulugly
